meanings.definition: The practice of preaching and evangelizing through television broadcasts.
meanings.sent1: Televangelism reaches many people through TV.
meanings.sent2: She watches televangelism every Sunday morning.
meanings.sent3: The televangelism show had funny commercials.
meanings.sent4: His televangelism style is as bright as a TV screen.
meanings.sent5: Televangelism brings the message to homes far and wide.

meanings.definition: A person who preaches and evangelizes through television broadcasts.
meanings.sent1: The televangelism spoke passionately on air.
meanings.sent2: Many admire the work of televangelism.
meanings.sent3: The televangelism's tie matched the studio curtains.
meanings.sent4: She was a beacon of hope in the world of televangelism.
meanings.sent5: His voice echoed through the screen, a true televangelism.
